title: BUG: Inconsistent Matplot layouts

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Indicates an unexpected problem or unintended behaviour

body:
### Issue Description

While removing the Boston dataset in #3200, it was observed that it is difficult to specify the layout of the resulting waterfall plot correctly. Please take a look at the minimal reproducible example below. Three variations have been tried so far. `plt.tight_layout()` would be my natural choice, but it leads to an uncentred plot in fullscreen mode. `plt.rcParams['figure.constrained_layout.use'] = True`  seems to always look good, but @thatlittleboy raised some concerns [here](https://github.com/shap/shap/pull/3200#discussion_r1302016585).

```python
import xgboost
import shap
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

X, y = shap.datasets.california()
model = xgboost.XGBRegressor().fit(X, y)
explainer = shap.Explainer(model)
shap_values = explainer(X)
fig = shap.plots.waterfall(shap_values[0], show=False)

# Alteration 1
# plt.tight_layout()

# Alteration 2
# plt.rcParams['figure.constrained_layout.use'] = True

plt.show()
```

## No alterations

y-axis labels are cut off in both regular and fullscreen modes.

### Regular `plt.show()`
![no_tight_regular](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/6fc23e0c-2e48-4ed1-9fb5-a5268beb6db9)

### Fullscreen
![no_tight_full_screen](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/49c5ace9-5a83-483a-acd6-74d54041c315)

## Alteration 1: `plt.tight_layout()`

Plot is not centred in fullscreen mode - notice more whitespace on left-hand side.

### Regular `plt.show()`
![tight_regular](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/01203392-601c-4a46-8695-26918afdd406)

### Fullscreen
![tight_full_screen](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/cc24fd28-26af-454c-9c34-822f43658039)


## Alteration 2: Constrained (as proposed in #3200) `plt.rcParams['figure.constrained_layout.use'] = True` 

Looks good.

### Regular `plt.show()`
![constrained_regular](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/dd6357fb-32eb-4610-a317-9fa029afaf26)

### Fullscreen
![constrained_full_screen](https://github.com/shap/shap/assets/82195909/30de07e9-3be6-4b8c-bc98-1531cbd94674)

### Expected Behavior

Alternative ways to achieve plots consistent with `plt.rcParams['figure.constrained_layout.use'] = True`.
